amendment.description: To allow full access to Tricare for National Guard and Reserve Personnel and their families on a continual basis, offset with reductions to the tax cut.

vote.text: Amendment SA 324 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 81.

action.text: Amendment SA 324 proposed by Senator Daschle for Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S4334-4336; text: CR S4335) To allow full access to Tricare for National Guard and Reserve Personnel and their families on a continual basis, offset with reductions to the tax cut.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 324 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 81.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 324 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 81.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 324 proposed by Senator Daschle for Senator Lincoln.
